long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Each new tab displays a different Fairy Tail wallpaper.
2. Choose or favorite a Fairy Tail background via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Google-powered search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to your most frequently visited sites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing websites quickly.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes easily.
12. Share content directly to social media.
13. Download wallpapers quickly.
14. One-click access to gaming.
15. Activate interactive animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your new Fairy Tail tab.
